name: UNITED "Polaris" Transcontinental: Boeing 777-200 between LAX and EWR
description:
Check out Paysend, a quick, secure and easy way to send money abroad.
https://transfers.onelink.me/1eze/winginitpaysend and use the exclusive transaction code 'WINGINITFREE' for three free transfers and an improved exchange rate until the end of the year!

Join me as I fly on United Airlines' Boeing 777-200 between Los Angeles and New York (Newark!) in business class. This is one of several "transcontinental" premium routes that attracts enhanced service and amenities. The beautiful Polaris seats are definitely my go-to if needing to cross the USA...how did United fare on the food and service, though? Watch to find out!

11:06 Wifi details

14:04 Breakfast is served at 37,000 feet!
15:15 Plugging a future video (it will be AMAZING!)
15:45 Amenity kit
16:00 IFE and chill
16:46 Second small meal service
17:34 Approach and landing at EWR
18:00 Conclusions, fare paid and thanks/goodbye!
